config.instructions: Select each tab to learn about mixed media.
config.title: Mixed Media

body.label: Collage
body.details: An artist created this collage with paint, recycled figurines, and small toys to represent the American flag.
body.imagealt: American flag made out of a variety of small figurines and toys

body.label: Installation Art
body.details: An artist created this installation art with leather and dyes to create a colorful textured display.
body.imagealt: a row of cut-up colorful pieces of leather hanging from the ceiling

body.label: Sculpture
body.details: This sculpture was created with bronze, ribbon, and wood. Artists often use more than one material to create a sculpture.
body.imagealt: bronze sculpture of a little girl

body.label: Assemblage
body.details: Rauschenberg sought inspiration from the objects in his environment. He created this artwork with paint and photographs.
body.imagealt: a mixed media painting with photography and paint

body.label: Wet-and-Dry
body.details: Wet-and-dry artwork is created with wet and dry media. This artwork is being created with dry media like colored pencils and wet media like watercolor.
body.imagealt: artwork being created with watercolor and colored pencils
